metadata.synopsis: | In SCL - TOWN - Masonry there is a pile of crashed bones on display. The plaque nearby suggests these are the bones of the head Mason who had conspiracy agains Sharrans. Player can spot here that something is off with these bones - like the skeletons contains bones of different people |
metadata.how_to_trigger: goto SCL_Main_Agoto -110; 26; 10Click on Pile of Crashed Bones

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *These bones appear to have come from a collection of different skeletons.*

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *A pile of crushed bones of varying shapes, sizes, and... creatures.*
